summary:
As Proventus Avenicci said, "Whiterun is the jewel of Skyrim".
But there's no library for example.
So, I've created this library mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#00ffff][size=6]Whiterun Library[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]As Proventus Avenicci said, "Whiterun is the jewel of Skyrim".
But there's no library for example.
So, I've created this library mod.

You can buy or sell books there.
You will find a lot of books for to read on the tables.
Don't steal or don't get caught. :)

This mod is Vanilla but works with all 3 DLCs and with all mods, I tried.

You'll see five staffs and three followers in the library.[/size]

[b][size=5]Library Staffs[/size][/b]
[size=3][b]Bari[/b] Library manager & book seller
[b]Ragna[/b] Book seller
[b]Snotra[/b] Book seller
[b]Visna[/b] Trader
[b]Marta[/b] Trainee[/size]

[b][size=5]Followers[/size][/b]
[size=3][b]Anundr[/b] 2H Male follower[/size]
[size=3][b]Dalli[/b] 1H Male follower[/size]
[size=3][b]Rinda[/b] Mage Female follower[/size]

[size=3]Special Edition: No[/size]
[size=3]I play oldrim, sorry.
[/size]
[size=3]May be someone wants to convert to [b]SSE[/b] with her/his/their own responsibility.[/size]
[size=3]But of course only for Nexus.[/size]

[b][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Recommended & Used Mods in Screenshots[/size][/color][/b][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/436]
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/436][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/436]HiRes Legible Road Signs[/url]﻿ by [b]SPARTAN VI[/b][/size]
[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443]Dream Girl[/url]﻿ by [b]Petrovich[/b][/size]
[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]﻿ by [b]HHaleyy[/b][/size]
[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10012]Unread Books Glow[/url]﻿ by duggelz[/size]

[b][size=5][color=#ff00ff]Note[/color][/size][/b]
[b][color=#ffff00]EXIT[/color][/b][size=3] sign is a joke sign because I wrote this with ship wood beams. :)[/size]
[size=3]It was easier than to create a new texture.[/size]
[size=3]I was going to create later but I've forgotten.[/size]
[size=3]But this door is really emergency exit to Skyrim.[/size]

[size=5][color=#00ff00][b]You can do whatever with this mod[/b][/color].[/size]
[size=3]You don't need to ask permission.[/size]
[size=3]If someone wants to add patch for example; a quest mod.[/size]
[size=3]Just give credit me and link to this mod, that's all.[/size]

[size=5][b][color=#ff0000]Don't upload to another site please[/color][/b].[/size]
[size=3]Of course you can present this mod with link to nexus if you want.[/size][/center][center][color=#00ff00][size=5]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819?tab=user+files]MY MODS[/url]﻿[/size][/color]
[/center]
author: cengo
